CustomField.formula: IF(Is_Historical__c = TRUE , IF(ZP_Add_Company_Addresses__c = TRUE, 1/11, 0) + IF(ZP_Add_Employees__c = TRUE, 1/11, 0) + IF(ZP_Set_Up_Federal_Taxes__c = TRUE, 1/11, 0) + IF(ZP_Set_Up_State_Taxes__c = TRUE, 1/11, 0) + IF(ZP_Set_Up_Bank_Account__c = TRUE, 1/11, 0) + IF(ZP_Report_Previous_Paystubs__c = TRUE, 1/11, 0) + IF(ZP_Select_a_Payroll_Schedule__c = TRUE, 1/11, 0) + IF(ZP_Add_Signatory__c = TRUE, 1/11, 0) + IF(ZP_Sign_Company_Forms__c = TRUE, 1/11, 0) + IF(ZP_Verify_Company_Bank_Account__c = TRUE, 1/11, 0) + IF(ZP_Enter_Unpaid_Tax_Liabilities__c = TRUE, 1/11, 0) , IF(ZP_Add_Company_Addresses__c = TRUE, 1/9, 0) + IF(ZP_Add_Employees__c = TRUE, 1/9, 0) + IF(ZP_Set_Up_Federal_Taxes__c = TRUE, 1/9, 0) + IF(ZP_Set_Up_State_Taxes__c = TRUE, 1/9, 0) + IF(ZP_Set_Up_Bank_Account__c = TRUE, 1/9, 0) + IF(ZP_Select_a_Payroll_Schedule__c = TRUE, 1/9, 0) + IF(ZP_Add_Signatory__c = TRUE, 1/9, 0) + IF(ZP_Sign_Company_Forms__c = TRUE, 1/9, 0) + IF(ZP_Verify_Company_Bank_Account__c = TRUE, 1/9, 0) )
